00022 #include "rawq/src/RawQWorkflow.h"
00023 //
00024 #include <cstring>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <list>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 #include <string>
00029 //
00030 
00031 std::string get_file(int argc, char *argv[], int &i)
00032 {
00033         std::string file = "";
00034 
00035         // Get the file name.
00036         int j=i+1;
00037         while (j<argc && argv[j][0] != '-')
00038         {
00039                 file += argv[j];
00040                 if (j<argc-1 && argv[j+1][0] != '-')
00041                         file += " ";
00042                 ++j;
00043         }
00044         i = j-1;
00045 
00046         return file;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00050 {
00051         // Get the inputs from the command line.
00052         std::string libPath;
00053         std::list<std::string> celFiles;
00054         int i=1;
00055         while(i<argc)
00056         {
00057                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-l") == 0)
00058                         libPath = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00059 
00060                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-i") == 0)
00061                         celFiles.push_back(get_file(argc, argv, i));
00062 
00063                 ++i;
00064         }
00065 
00066         CRawQWorkflow q;
00067         std::list<std::string>::iterator iter;
00068         for (iter = celFiles.begin(); iter != celFiles.end(); ++iter)
00069         {
00070                 std::string celFile = *iter;
00071                 CRawQWorkflow::RawQError error = q.ComputeRawQ(celFile.c_str(), libPath.c_str());
00072                 if (error == CRawQWorkflow::NoError)
00073                 {
00074                         std::cout << "RawQ = " << q.GetRawQ() << std::endl;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077         return 0;
00078 }
